import React from 'react' import { Outlet,Link,NavLink,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' import {useContext,useState } from 'react' import { useRef } from 'react' export default function Layout() { let user = useContext(UserLogged) const errorMessage = useRef() const [search,SetSearch] = useState() let navigate = useNavigate() function close(){ const CloseMessage = document.getElementById('alert-message') gsap.to(errorMessage.current,.4,{ease:Power3.easeOut,x:100,opacity:0}).then(()=>CloseMessage.remove()) } function GetSearch(e){ e.preventDefault() navigate({pathname:'/searchTags',search:`?search=${search}`}) } return ( <>
GamesDB
    Home Main Page {user.name?{user.signout()}}> Log out :<> Sign in Register }
{GetSearch(e)}}> {SetSearch(e.target.value)}}>
{user.name?:
{auth.error} {close()}}>
}
) }
